event.title: Establishing safety in needling
event.overview:
**Presentation 1** talks you through contraindications and precautions, followed by a multi-choice quiz to consolidate your learning

**Presentation 2** takes you through adverse events, and how to best deal with them, followed by a multi-choice quiz to ensure you know what to do!

event.title: Let's get some fundamentals covered
event.overview:
Here, there are several short videos outlining some of the fundamentals related to acupuncture practice:

**Needling basics** - needle insertion, depth of insertion, when to use different sized needles

**Clinical reasoning** - learn the foundations to TCM and Western reasoning

**Establishing the role of acupuncture** - when to use it (HINT: always with other interventions!)

**Pain physiology** - An easy to follow demonstration of pain physiology, and how acupuncture can influence immediate pain relief

event.title: Facial Symptoms
event.overview:
Short, sharp videos perfect for busy professionals. You will learn:

- Prominent meridians that cover the face
- Needling techniques for prominent acupoints 
- Acupoint recipes for Trigeminal neuralgia, facial palsy's + TMD pain
- Facial symptoms case study
- Facial symptoms multi-choice quiz to cement your understanding

event.title: Neck Symptoms
event.overview:
Short, sharp videos perfect for busy professional. You will learn:

- Prominent meridians that cover the neck
- Needling techniques for prominent acupoints 
- Treatment recipes for central + lateral neck pain
- Neck pain case study
- Neck pain multi-choice quiz to cement your understanding

event.title: Headaches
event.overview:
Short, sharp videos perfect for busy professional. You will learn:

- Prominent meridians that cover the head
- Needling techniques for prominent acupoints 
- Acupoint recipes for lateral + frontal headaches
- Headache case study
- Headache multi-choice quiz to cement your understanding

strapiCourses.name: Acupuncture for Headaches, Neck and Facial Pain
strapiCourses.summary: Content created specifically for online training, curated and delivered by Dr. Carl Clarkson
strapiCourses.details:
**Thirty** lessons, spanning **Five** chapters, deftly combine Carl's wealth of clinical + research experience, with his passion, enthusiasm and dedication to exceptional educational experiences.

Lectures, Practical Demonstrations, Case studies, Multi-choice quizzes + handouts to download or edit as you go - we have everything you could ever want to help YOU on YOUR learning journey.

##### What does the course allow you to do?

On completion, you will feel ***confident, safe and effective*** in the treatment of:

Lateral + Frontal headaches
Central + Lateral neck pain
Facial Palsy, Trigeminal Neuralgia + TMD

##### Requirements

- You are a registered Heathcare Professional
- You have completed your foundation acupuncture training. Not done foundtaion training? Click here to read more and book onto one of our courses

seo.description: Online acupuncture course for headaches, neck and facial pain. Advance your dry needling and acupuncture skills with this specialist acupuncture course.
seo.title: Acupuncture For Head, Neck and Facial Pain | Breeze Academy
